scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Porter notes how busy she has been, encloses her address and urges him to write to her.

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, Washington, D. C., to George Marion O'Donnell, New Haven, Connecticut, enclosing her address and urging him to write to her 1959 Oct 15
